Responsibilities & Context ASA International is one of the worldтАЩs largest and fastest growing international microfinance banking institutions offering socially responsible loans to underbanked, low-income female micro-entrepreneurs in Asia and Africa (тАЬASA InternationalтАЭ or the тАЬGroupтАЭ). ASA International promotes financial inclusion and has successfully shown that access to financial services helps to reduce poverty and promotes social-economic progress for its predominantly female client base. ASA International has a premium listing on the main market of the London Stock Exchange and serves close to 2.3 million customers across 13 countries in Asia and Africa. It has corporate head offices in Amsterdam, the Netherlands as well as in Dhaka, Bangladesh. ASA International provides small loans ranging from USD 250 to USD 2,000. Almost all customers are women that run small businesses, from small shops, restaurants, sewing businesses, to various trading activities and cottage industries. Additional Requirements Candidate must have computer skill & well conversant with Microsoft Office applications. Candidate should have profound knowledge on Standard Operating Procedure (SOP), Pharmaceutical Analysis, Pharmaceutical Calibration/Validation, Process Validation, Proper Documentations, Regulatory Affairs etc. Coordinate pharmaceutical-related activities for all products. Responsibilities & Context Carry out environmental monitoring of manufacturing area. Perform sampling & testing of raw materials, packaging materials, finished products, pharmaceutical water, pure steam, compressed air etc. Conduct calibration of equipment. Prepare media & reagent. Maintain stock cultures of bacteria and fungi. Record data accurately and consistently. Support regulatory inspections and compliance audits. Monitors drugs manufacturing activities in compliance with the requirements of cGMP. Performs other duties as assigned by PD, QA, QC & Production Manager. Skills & Expertise Microbiology Suggested by Pharmaceuticals Microbiologist Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Salary & other benefits will be considered as per company rules & policies. Special preference will be given to the candidates who have practical knowledge & experience in launching injectable/Sterile Products and attractive salary will be offered to such candidates. Responsibilities & Context Job Context ACI Motors Limited is one of the most growing concerns of ACI Limited. We have Agri Machineries (Tractor, Harvester, Power Tiller, Diesel Engine, Rice Transplanter & Water Pump), Automobiles (Yamaha Motorcycles), Infrastructural Equipment (Kobelco, Lovol, Case & Jungheinrich), Tire Solutions (CEAT), Lubricants (Yamalube & Liqui Moly), Commercial Vehicles (Foton), Renewable Energy (EcoFlow & GoodWe) & Diesel Generator (YorPower, Himoinsa & Wechai) etc. in our product line. Job Responsibilities To assess proposed customers potentiality & ability to pay the installment on due time. To visit proposed customersтАЩ office/ house to verify the declared establishment, reference, bank records, income sources, mortgage etc. for credit assessment. To prepare overall assessment report and comments on proposed customers. To take initiative to facilitate regular collection from credit customers. To reinforce action against overdue customers and ensure recovery with proper planning. To liaise with law enforcement authorities related to credit recovery or capture the products. To liaise with Head Office credit management & sales team daily. To prepare daily/ monthly report on collection, customersтАЩ outstanding and other activities. To ensure confidentiality on credit management of the company and its documents. To do any other tasks assigned by the supervisor time to time. Here`s a more detailed breakdown: Culinary Responsibilities: Menu Planning and Development : Creating and developing new Thai dishes, as well as maintaining the authenticity of traditional recipes. Ingredient Sourcing and Preparation : Selecting fresh, high-quality ingredients and preparing them for cooking. Cooking : Preparing a range of Thai dishes, including appetizers, main courses, and desserts, using traditional techniques and recipes. Food Quality and Presentation : Ensuring that all dishes meet the restaurant`s standards for taste, appearance, and consistency. Adapting to Trends: Staying informed about current culinary trends and incorporating them into menu development while maintaining the core Thai flavors, according to Simply Tasty Thai. Operational Responsibilities: Kitchen Management: Supervising and managing kitchen staff, delegating tasks, and ensuring efficient workflow. Inventory Management: Monitoring food supplies, placing orders, and maintaining proper storage of ingredients. Food Safety and Hygiene : Ensuring that all food preparation and handling practices comply with health and safety regulations. Collaboration: Working closely with other kitchen staff, servers, and restaurant management to ensure smooth operations. Additional Responsibilities: Training: Training and mentoring kitchen staff on Thai cooking techniques and food safety procedures. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Responsibilities & Context We are opening a New Thai Restaurant in Dhaka fully owned by Thai National with itтАЩs Ambience, Attentive Service and delectable dishes. It offers a taste of authentic Thai Flavors in the Heart of Dhaka. We are looking for a dedicated and enthusiastic Line Chef to support our culinary team in creating delicious and memorable dining experiences. As a Line Chef, you will work closely with chefs and kitchen staff, playing a vital role in food preparation, kitchen organization, and maintaining high-quality standards. The ideal candidate should be passionate about the culinary arts, eager to learn, and ready to contribute to the success of our kitchen. Responsibilities: Assist in food preparation, including chopping, slicing, and measuring ingredients. Support chefs in the cooking and assembly of dishes, ensuring adherence to recipes. Collaborate with kitchen staff to coordinate the timely execution of food orders. Assist in maintaining kitchen equipment and reporting any issues to the chef. Follow proper food safety and hygiene procedures at all times. Uphold high standards of cleanliness and order in the kitchen environment. Skills: Previous experience in a kitchen or culinary environment is preferred but not mandatory. Basic understanding of food preparation techniques and kitchen safety. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities. Excellent communication skills and a willingness to learn from experienced chefs. Physical ability to stand for extended periods, lift heavy objects, and perform repetitive tasks. Basic knife skills and familiarity with common kitchen equipment. Strong attention to detail and commitment to cleanliness. Team collaboration and the ability to take direction from chefs. This role transforms raw data into meaningful insights through advanced data modelling, DAX calculations, and userтАСfriendly visualizations that support decisionтАСmaking across the organization. Design, develop, and publish interactive Power BI dashboards, paginated reports, KPI scorecards, and analytics solutions aligned with business needs. Build optimized data models using Power Query (M) and DAX, ensuring best practices such as star schema design, normalization, and performance tuning. Connect and integrate data from multiple sources including SQL Server, ERP systems, Excel, APIs, and cloud platforms; perform data cleansing and transformation. Develop drill-down, drill-through, and dynamic reports for operational and management stakeholders across Finance, Sales, HR, Operations, and Supply Chain. Optimize dashboard performance, troubleshoot complex DAX queries, and enhance refresh efficiency and user experience. Implement row-level security (RLS), manage Power BI Service work spaces, gateways, and dataset refresh schedules while ensuring data governance and compliance. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Market analysis and strategic thinking ability. Client-focused and solution-oriented mindset. Ability to work independently and meet targets. Responsibilities & Context Context: Betopia Limited is seeking a dynamic and target-driven Business Development Manager тАУ Hosting Business to drive growth in our Domain, SSL, Web Hosting, VPS Hosting, and Business Email service portfolio. The ideal candidate will be responsible for generating new business opportunities, building partnerships, managing enterprise and SME accounts, and achieving revenue targets in the hosting and cloud services market. This role requires strong sales acumen, knowledge of hosting solutions, and the ability to develop long-term customer relationships. Job Responsibilities: 1. Business Growth & Revenue Generation: Drive sales of Domain Registration, SSL Certificates, Shared Hosting, VPS Hosting, and Business Email services. Identify and acquire new SME, corporate, and startup clients. Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue targets. Develop and execute go-to-market strategies for hosting services. Expand channel partner and reseller networks. 2. Market Development & Strategy: Conduct market research and competitor analysis. Identify new revenue streams (reseller hosting, white-label solutions, enterprise hosting). Develop pricing strategies and bundled offerings. Create promotional campaigns in collaboration with marketing team. 3. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with corporate clients, web agencies,

job_description: Executive (Customs Sarkar), Supply Chain Department (Sea Resources Agencies Limited) : Rancon Holdings Limited Jobs ENG ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Rancon Holdings Limited Executive (Customs Sarkar), Supply Chain Department (Sea Resources Agencies Limited) Application Deadline : 08 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Published: 17 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Excellent at MS Office Good Communication Good analytical and problem-solving skill. Strong knowledge of customs processes, logistics software, and ERP systems. Responsibilities & Context Coordinate with customs officials to ensure timely clearance of goods. Handle submission of required documents, including Bills of Entry, invoices, and permits. Resolve discrepancies or disputes that arise during inspections. Verify the accuracy and completeness of shipping and customs documents. Ensure all necessary permits, licenses, and certifications are in place. Stay updated on Bangladeshi customs laws, tariffs, and duty structures. Ensure all goods comply with import/export restrictions and trade policies. Act as the primary point of contact between the company and customs officials. Collaborate with port authorities, transporters, and other stakeholders to expedite processes. Handle on-the-spot issues, including valuation disputes, duty adjustments, or other challenges. Escalate unresolved issues to higher management when necessary. Maintain detailed records of all customs transactions and clearance processes. Provide regular updates on the status of shipments to the operations team.
